text: Eugene Joseph Wright (May 29, 1923 â€“ December 30, 2020) was an American jazz bassist. He was a member of the Dave Brubeck Quartet. Wright died on December 30, 2020 in Los Angeles at the age of 97.Eugene Wright, Steadfast Bassist and Longtime Anchor of the Dave Brubeck Quartet, Dies at 97 ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American bass guitarists Category:American jazz musicians Category:Musicians from Chicago
